basics.name: Kingford
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with expertise in building scalable, performant, and visually stunning applications. Specialized in React, Next.js, and Cloud Architecture.

work.name: TechCorp
work.summary: Architected a microservices-based e-commerce platform serving 1M+ users.
highlights: Reduced infrastructure costs by 30% through serverless optimization.
Led a team of 5 developers in building a cloud-native SaaS platform.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 50%.

highlights: Led a team of 3 juniors and established frontend coding standards.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.
